Portfolio.name: Training Log
Portfolio.description: A python application made to keep a log of training workouts. Example data is shown in December 2023.
Portfolio.largeDescription: Made using tkinter GUI and its calendar import. Dates.py is the file containing all of the data. This is then imported into Calendar.py where it is displayed in a calendar for each date where data is available. I data is available the the corresponding date is marked green and displays the information when clicked.
